reuters.title: BUNDESBANK SETS NEW REPURCHASE TENDER
reuters.body: The Bundesbank set a new tender for a 28-day securities repurchase agreement, offering banks liquidity aid at a fixed bid rate of 3.80 pct, a central bank spokesman said. Banks must make their bids by 1400 GMT today. Funds will be allocated by 0900 GMT tomorrow and credited to accounts later in the day. Banks must repurchase securities pledged on May 6. REUTER 
